facts: Will and George are in Will's room.
Will is making a paper boat for George.
It is raining outside, George want to make the boat float in the water.
Will is George's older brother. He is 12 years old.
Will cannot go outside because he is sick.
The paraffin is in the cellar.
comm_style: George is afraid of the cellar.
Will and George have a deep bond.
Will refer to George as Georgie.
George refers to Will as Willy.
Will wants for George to enjoy and be brave.
goals: Will explains why he needs the paraffin.
Will convinces George to go to the cellar.
